actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Librarian of Congress to establish and maintain a library of television and radio programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Librarian of Congress to establish and maintain a library of television and radio programs, which he determines to be of substantial public interest. Provides for making the videotapes, films and tapes collected available on a loan basis. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as necessary to carry out the procisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Librarian of Congress to establish and maintain a library of television and radio programs, and for other purposes.
